trends: There have been no other sightings in The Colony
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy Room mate walked outside to the back yard to smoke she looked up and immediately called out I ran out side and saw 40+ objects moving at a steady pace across the western sky due north.We all ran through the house and went to the front yard. It initially looked like bubbles from a childs bubble hoop but the direction of travel was not erratic like a stray bubble, rather they traveled at a consistent pace. The moved like a bubble but appeared to have a white light in the interior of them. We watched them travel north until it looked like they came to a stop and just faded away.Another car actually stopped and asked us if we just saw what they had saw. Every one was confused of exactly what they were.I attempted to film it with my camera on my phone but due to the excitement didn't push start...
